title: Alleviating effects of microplastics together with tetracycline hydrochloride on the physiological stress of Closterium sp.
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00286E, Paper
Yun Kong, Qingyun Zhou, Renjuan Wang, Qi Chen, Xiangyang Xu, Liang Zhu, Yue Wang
Tetracycline hydrochloride (TCH) has significant inhibition effect on microalgae Closterium sp., while the polyethylene terephthalate (PET) or polybutylene terephthalate (PBT) can alleviate the ecotoxicity owing to the antagonism between microplastics and TCH.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
